meaningMnemonic:
You’re looking for a <kanji>neglect</kanji>ed place that you can <kanji>open</kanji> up and use for <vocabulary>evacuation</vocabulary>.

While 避難 is a more general term for evacuating or seeking shelter during emergencies, 疎開 describes evacuating specifically from cities or crowded areas to safer places during disasters like earthquakes, tsunamis, etc.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
